Text:
My dvd player does not play x264 files, only avi.

How can I watch x264 files on TV? Please specify make and model of the device.

Tks a lot!
@marcpb get a western digital live plus. plays everything

@marcpb
google "media player" and read
ck big boxes, newegg, etc for media players
ck dvd/br players with usb or network connection
read specs and reviews
with a little effort, you'll find media players

@marcpb: Buy yourself a raspberrypi. It costs $35 and is the size of a credit card. Install XBMC on it and plug it into your tv, not only is it powerful enough to play SD x264 it can play back 1080P no problem.
